entry.title: Chrome omnibox extension
entry.summary: Some months ago, I developed (for fun) a Google Chrome extension to search in haskell documentation directly from the chrome search bar. The development was pretty easy and cool, that's why I wanted to describe it here.

entry.title: Spotify shortcut on linux
entry.summary: I love Spotify, and I love my linux environment, but I didn't knew how to map shortcuts to the Spotify linux client: we can do it easily using dbus!
